intro: Psychotria brachythamnus, commonly known as the dwarf psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, evergreen leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in shaded, humid environments such as rainforests. Psychotria brachythamnus is also notable for its role in traditional medicine and its use in certain cultural practices.
